body_html: If something like this were implemented, what kind of slowdown in comparison to float32 operations would be expected? Trading speed and precision for memory is still of interest for some applications; for instance SRGAN and Gatys Algorithm.
body_text: If something like this were implemented, what kind of slowdown in comparison to float32 operations would be expected? Trading speed and precision for memory is still of interest for some applications; for instance SRGAN and Gatys Algorithm.
body: If something like this were implemented, what kind of slowdown in comparison to float32 operations would be expected? Trading speed and precision for memory is still of interest for some applications; for instance [SRGAN](https://arxiv.org/abs/1609.04802) and [Gatys Algorithm](https://arxiv.org/abs/1508.06576).
